word: 5-11. A Prayer to Be Studied.--[Nehemiah 1:5, 6 quoted.] Not only did Nehemiah say that Israel had sinned. He acknowledged with penitence that he and his father's house had sinned. "We have dealt corruptly against Thee," he says, placing himself among those who had dishonored God by not standing stiffly for the truth. . . . [Nehemiah 1:7-11 quoted.] . . .
